replies.author: tangxian
replies.txt_content:
是设置吧！
这是我的可以参考
Builder:        #组名
    default: true  #新玩家进入服务器是否进入该组
    permissions:     #下面是权限
    - plots.use
    - plots.plot.1
    - plots.permpack.basic
    - chestcommands.open.example.yml
    - chestcommands.item.example.yml
    - chestcommands.open.dp.yml
    - chestcommands.open.gh.yml
    - chestcommands.open.zy.yml
    - UltimateGuild.kick
    - UltimateGuild.create
    - UltimateGuild.spawn
    - UltimateGuild.view
    - UltimateGuild.info
    - UltimateGuild.list
    - UltimateGuild.join
    - UltimateGuild.listmembers
    - UltimateGuild.leave
    - UltimateGuild.togglechat
    - UltimateGuild.donate
    - UltimateGuild.learn
    - UltimateGuild.withdraw
    - UltimateGuild.disband
    - UltimateGuild.deliver
    - UltimateGuild.accept
    - UltimateGuild.reject
    - UltimateGuild.title
    - UltimateGuild.setbase
    - UltimateGuild.upgrade
    - UltimateGuild.top
    - -essentials.hat
    - essentials.kits.每日礼包
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: false     #是否有建筑权限
      suffix: ''
